danfulea.misc.graphics3d

Class SpurGearThinBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      • javax.media.j3d.Node
        • javax.media.j3d.Group
          • javax.media.j3d.TransformGroup
            • danfulea.misc.graphics3d.Gear
              • danfulea.misc.graphics3d.SpurGear
                • danfulea.misc.graphics3d.SpurGearThinBody

  • public class SpurGearThinBody
extends SpurGear
    Class for visualize a 3D SpurGearThinBody. It is based on old java3D tutorials freely available on the web (at that time).
    Author:
    Dan Fulea, 12 MAY. 2005

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpurGearThinBody

        public SpurGearThinBody(int toothCount,
                        float pitchCircleRadius,
                        float shaftRadius,
                        float addendum,
                        float dedendum,
                        float gearThickness)
        Construct a SpurGearThinBody;
        Parameters:
        toothCount - number of teeth
        pitchCircleRadius - radius at center of teeth
        shaftRadius - radius of hole at center
        addendum - distance from pitch circle to top of teeth
        dedendum - distance from pitch circle to root of teeth
        gearThickness - thickness of the gear

      • SpurGearThinBody

        public SpurGearThinBody(int toothCount,
                        float pitchCircleRadius,
                        float shaftRadius,
                        float addendum,
                        float dedendum,
                        float gearThickness,
                        float toothTipThickness,
                        float toothToValleyAngleRatio,
                        javax.media.j3d.Appearance look)
        Construct a SpurGearThinBody;
        Parameters:
        toothCount - number of teeth
        pitchCircleRadius - radius at center of teeth
        shaftRadius - radius of hole at center
        addendum - distance from pitch circle to top of teeth
        dedendum - distance from pitch circle to root of teeth
        gearThickness - thickness of the gear
        toothTipThickness - thickness of the tip of the tooth
        toothToValleyAngleRatio - ratio of tooth valley to circular pitch (must be less or equal to .25)
        look - the gear's appearance object

      • SpurGearThinBody

        public SpurGearThinBody(int toothCount,
                        float pitchCircleRadius,
                        float shaftRadius,
                        float addendum,
                        float dedendum,
                        float gearThickness,
                        float toothTipThickness,
                        float toothToValleyAngleRatio,
                        javax.media.j3d.Appearance look,
                        float bodyThickness,
                        float crossSectionWidth)
        Construct a SpurGearThinBody;
        Parameters:
        toothCount - number of teeth
        pitchCircleRadius - radius at center of teeth
        shaftRadius - radius of hole at center
        addendum - distance from pitch circle to top of teeth
        dedendum - distance from pitch circle to root of teeth
        gearThickness - thickness of the gear
        toothTipThickness - thickness of the tip of the tooth
        toothToValleyAngleRatio - ratio of tooth valley to circular pitch (must be less or equal to .25)
        look - the gear's appearance object
        bodyThickness - the thickness of the gear body
        crossSectionWidth - the width of the depressed portion of the gear's body
